title: A love story
description: This novel is about young love between a man and a woman that survives differences in upbringing, misunderstandings, and the test of time. The tale is also about a little-understood attachment between a father and his son. The author weaves a tale of love that finds expression in a sense of commitment and care... It is also about the triumph of idealism and good-over-negative forces much needed in today s jaded world, here is a love story that works at many levels.
author: Varalotti Rengasamy
